name: Undead Hunter FPS Sniper Shoot
description:
*2019 Award Wining Zombie shooting game*

Become the hunter you've always dreamed to be...
The zombie Apocalypse is here, and you must show your sniper skills to survive!
Select your weapon, practise your shooting and kill all the zombies who want to see you dead.

Considered as the most real zombie game, you can enjoy amazing graphics with extreme realism. Will you be able to survive the Undead's attack??
Won't you be too scared?? THEN... PROVE IT!

- You can choose different weapons
- Extremely realist simulator
- Complete the level to go to the next
- Point to the head of the zombies to kill them in one perfect shot
- Find ammo to recharge the weapon
- Kill all the zombies, and survive the waves
- And most of all... do not let fear paralyze you!!!

Be brave, show your courage and save the human race by exterminating all the zombies!!
